job_details.Functieomschrijving:
As a DevOps Engineer for security testing you are responsible for integrating and maintaining solution that are supporting the security testing activities within ABN AMRO. This role requires a deep understanding of security, DevOps principles and Azure cloud services.

   As DevOps Engineer for security testing, you are involved in the Security Assurance - Security testing domain which includes activities like pentesting, red teaming, continuous attacker mode and coordinated vulnerability disclosure and subsequent risk assessments on system assets of ABN AMRO.

   Your knowledge and experience will contribute to improving the overall security posture of the bank by helping development teams to bring security by design in their day-to-day work and by ensuring compliance with applicable ABN AMRO policies, procedures, and regulations. What do you see when you envision the next step? Work on achieving your goals and develop yourself professionally and personally. Tell us your story. We want to hear it!, As a DevOps Engineer for security testing you are responsible for integrating solution that are supporting the security testing activities within ABN AMRO. You feel at home in a technical environment. You have shown in the past that you are able to learn quickly and apply the learned skills immediately. You like to work together with other specialists, and you know from experience teamwork sets changes in motion. And that is what you want: getting things done!
job_details.full_text:
DevOps Engineer - Security Testing

As a DevOps Engineer for security testing you are responsible for integrating and maintaining solution that are supporting the security testing activities within ABN AMRO. This role requires a deep understanding of security, DevOps principles and Azure cloud services.

   As DevOps Engineer for security testing, you are involved in the Security Assurance - Security testing domain which includes activities like pentesting, red teaming, continuous attacker mode and coordinated vulnerability disclosure and subsequent risk assessments on system assets of ABN AMRO.

   Your knowledge and experience will contribute to improving the overall security posture of the bank by helping development teams to bring security by design in their day-to-day work and by ensuring compliance with applicable ABN AMRO policies, procedures, and regulations. What do you see when you envision the next step? Work on achieving your goals and develop yourself professionally and personally. Tell us your story. We want to hear it!, As a DevOps Engineer for security testing you are responsible for integrating solution that are supporting the security testing activities within ABN AMRO. You feel at home in a technical environment. You have shown in the past that you are able to learn quickly and apply the learned skills immediately. You like to work together with other specialists, and you know from experience teamwork sets changes in motion. And that is what you want: getting things done!

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on DevOps principles and security testing within a cloud environment (Azure). While it mentions integrating solutions that support security testing, it does not detail any core AI/ML model development, generative AI applications, or predictive modeling tasks. The emphasis is on traditional DevOps practices for security, not on AI engineering.

job_tasks.justification: The role is explicitly titled 'DevOps Engineer' and discusses integrating and maintaining solutions that support activities within a domain, implying a focus on operational aspects and infrastructure, which aligns with MLOps principles even if not explicitly AI-related.

The role is responsible for improving the 'overall security posture of the bank' and ensuring 'compliance with applicable ABN AMRO policies, procedures, and regulations', indicating a need to understand business context and regulatory requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: improving the overall security posture of the bank

job_tasks.justification: The role aims to help 'development teams to bring security by design in their day-to-day work', which requires understanding business development processes and integrating security requirements.
job_tasks.phrase: help development teams to bring security by design in their day-to-day work

soft_skills.phrase: able to learn quickly and apply the learned skills immediately
like to work together with other specialists
Work on achieving your goals and develop yourself professionally and personally.
